anaerobic digestion.Description: Anaerobic digestion is a process that produces biogas, which can be used as a renewable energy source.
Anaerobic digestion is an effective method for managing organic waste, reducing the amount of waste sent to landfills.
Anaerobic digestion helps in reducing methane emissions, as it captures and utilizes methane produced during the process.
